metadata.name: The Mesgarha Bazaar
metadata.description:
The Mesgarha Bazaar

Mesgar: Someone who makes copper dishes.(Persian word)
Bazaar: The Bazaar , is a permanently enclosed marketplace or street where goods and services are exchanged or sold.(Persian word)

history:
The history of coppersmiths in Iran reaches at least 5,000 years ago and in the ancient city of "Silk Kashan", and the first human-derived metal was this copper metal and the first metal workers were Iranians.

List of copper markets in Iran:
1-Isfahan Bazaar
2-Yazd Bazaar
3-shiraz Bazaar
4-Zanjan Bazaar
5-Tehran Bazaar
 
About NFT:
This NFT represents a part of Iran's copper market (The Mesgarha Bazaar) and is designed in magicavoxel software.
